caption.p: Relationship between acclimation ability and thermal range of the environment (°C) for 16 species of Plethodontid salamanders at the population level ( p = .027, R 2 = .18). Acclimation ability calculated as VO 2 at 22°C acclimation— VO 2 at 14°C acclimation for the 25°C test temperature. Standard metabolic rates were weight‐corrected prior to the analysis. Thermal range data (temperature annual range) were obtained from the Worldclim online database
